H0.text: Keflavik is the main international airport of which country. Iceland

H1.text: Keflavik is the main international airport of which country. Norway

H2.text: Keflavik is the main international airport of which country. Denmark

H3.text: Keflavik is the main international airport of which country. Hyui

A4.text: Keflavík Airport is the largest airport in Iceland and the country's main hub for international transportation.

A5.text: The airport is located approximately 3 km (1.9 mi) west of the town of Keflavík, Reykjanesbær and 50 km (30 mi) southwest of the capital Reykjavík.
